entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
